## I turn data science and AI into scalable success at visionary companies.

I am currently Chief of Staff at [Keywell.ai](https://keywell.ai/){target="_blank"}, where I lead operations and customer success. Previously, I was Founding Director of Data Science at [Clairity](https://clairity.com/){target="_blank"} and the first Analytics Lead at [FlagshipRTL](https://flagshiprtl.com/){target="_blank"}.

I am also the founder of [Powered Analysis](https://powered-analysis.com/){target="_blank"}, a research and education AI company dedicated to raising the standard of automated data analysis. Since 2020, I have been an adjuct professor of data science at George Washington University's [School of Media and Public Affairs](https://smpa.gwu.edu/){target="_blank"} and in the University of Pennsylvania's [Data Analytics Certificate program](https://lpsonline.sas.upenn.edu/academics/certificates/data-analytics){target="_blank"}.
